short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a website screenshot, doodle on it and download!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to take a screenshot of a web page. It also allows you to draw on the screenshot you took for taking notes, and highlight important parts of the web page. You can also download it afterwards.
